content.question:
​

The four points are marked on the following coordinates:

(negative 5 comma 0)

(0 comma 5)

(0 comma negative 5)

(5 comma 0)

​The graph indicates four points in the complex plane. Each complex number has polar coordinates <math alttext="open parentheses r comma theta close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following completes the expression for the four points in the polar form <math alttext="open parentheses 5 cos theta close parentheses plus i open parentheses 5 sin theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mfenced><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>cos</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>sin</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​​<math alttext="theta equals pi over 4 plus open parentheses pi over 4 close parentheses k"><semantics><mrow><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mi>k</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="k equals 1 comma 2 comma 3 comma 4"><semantics><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mo> </mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mo> </mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo> </mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="theta equals pi over 4 plus open parentheses pi over 2 close parentheses k"><semantics><mrow><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mi>k</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="k equals 1 comma 2 comma 3 comma 4"><semantics><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mo> </mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mo> </mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo> </mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="theta equals pi over 2 plus open parentheses pi over 2 close parentheses k"><semantics><mrow><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mi>k</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="k equals 1 comma 2 comma 3 comma 4"><semantics><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mo> </mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mo> </mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo> </mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="theta equals pi over 2 plus pi k"><semantics><mrow><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>π</mi><mi>k</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="k equals 1 comma 2 comma 3 comma 4"><semantics><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mo> </mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mo> </mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo> </mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="theta equals pi over 2 plus open parentheses pi over 2 close parentheses k"><semantics><mrow><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mi>k</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="k equals 1 comma 2 comma 3 comma 4"><semantics><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mo> </mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mo> </mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo> </mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
